item.title: Buy network gear
item.description: This page contains affiliate links to different network products I use regularly and quite fond of. Using the below links supports me writing this blog. MikroTik RB750GR3 My home router running OpenWRT. Quite a beast for its price. Amazon NL Amazon US Bol.com
